channel.title: case on Nerves Project
channel.description: Recent content in case on Nerves Project

item.title: Managing Fleets of Smart Farming Devices with Nerves at Farmbot
item.description: FarmBot uses Nerves to manage fleets of smart farming devices.

item.title: Using Nerves to Build a Facial Recognition-Powered Beer Kiosk System at Hop
item.description: Hop used Nerves to build the world’s first self-serve beer kiosk powered by facial recognition technology.

item.title: Increasing Warehouse Efficiency with Nerves at Le Tote
item.description: Learn how LeTote used Nerves to build a web-based kiosk system to drive warehouse productivity
